description:
Extract the peaks of a spherical harmonic function in each voxel.

Peaks of the spherical harmonic function in each voxel are located by commencing a Newton search along each of a set of pre-specified directions

The spherical harmonic coefficients are stored according the conventions described the main documentation, which can be found at the following link: 
https://mrtrix.readthedocs.io/en/3.0.4/concepts/spherical_harmonics.html

References:

Jeurissen, B.; Leemans, A.; Tournier, J.-D.; Jones, D.K.; Sijbers, J. Investigating the prevalence of complex fiber configurations in white matter tissue with diffusion magnetic resonance imaging. Human Brain Mapping, 2013, 34(11), 2747-2766

num.title: num
num.description: the number of peaks to extract (default: 3).

phi.title: phi
phi.description: the direction of a peak to estimate. The algorithm will attempt to find the same number of peaks as have been specified using this option.

theta.title: theta
theta.description: the direction of a peak to estimate. The algorithm will attempt to find the same number of peaks as have been specified using this option.

items.description: the direction of a peak to estimate. The algorithm will attempt to find the same number of peaks as have been specified using this option.

direction.description: the direction of a peak to estimate. The algorithm will attempt to find the same number of peaks as have been specified using this option.

peaks.title: peaks
peaks.description: the program will try to find the peaks that most closely match those in the image provided.

threshold.title: threshold
threshold.description: only peak amplitudes greater than the threshold will be considered.

seeds.title: seeds
seeds.description: specify a set of directions from which to start the multiple restarts of the optimisation (by default, the built-in 60 direction set is used)

mask.title: mask
mask.description: only perform computation within the specified binary brain mask image.

fast.title: fast
fast.description: use lookup table to compute associated Legendre polynomials (faster, but approximate).

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

SH.title: SH
SH.description: the input image of SH coefficients.

output.title: output
output.description: the output image. Each volume corresponds to the x, y & z component of each peak direction vector in turn.
